Name: Alanda Tinto
Wine Description: The different grape varieties were fermented together, part in stainless steel, part in cement, with one third of full clusters and aged for one year in used barrels and matured for a further three months in stainless steel before being bottle unfiltered. The nose is fruit-driven, there are no traces of oak, a combination of cherry fruit, herbal aromas and a pinch of spices, and a medium-bodied palate with focused, red cherry flavors, fine tannins and balanced acidity. This is supple and easy to drink, fresh and very pleasant.

Name: Bourgeois Grenache
Wine Description: A deep garnet-colored wine offering up aromas of kirsch, white pepper, pipe tobacco, braised meat, slate, and red currant. These exotic aromatics are followed in the mouth by lush flavors of black cherries, dark plum, earthy minerals, fine-grain tannins and balanced acidity.

Name: Jessie James Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Soulfully aromatic with complex structure rich red fruit, spice and forest floor, broad weight with fine tannins and elegant acidity.

Name: Barolo Prapò
Wine Description: It has aromas of withered roses is accompanied by a slight fragrance of underbrush, making the wine extremely well-balanced and rounded. With its excellent acidity and tannins

Name: Schioppettino di Cialla
Wine Description: Balanced red with ruby hues. Exceptionally elegant bouquet and strong personality (spicy fragrances with aroma of soft fruit). Dry, but rare and elegant (special white pepper flavour); rich nobility of character.

Name: Voyageur Yellow Jacket Vineyard Syrah
Wine Description: This has a deep, penetrating nose of violets, black pepper, tobacco, bacon fat and wild blackberries, all beautifully focused around an abundance of dark fruits, black licorice, kirsch, riverbed minerals and cured black olives. The mouth feel is rich and refined.

Name: Stagecoach Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Dark black cherry fruit, tobacco and hints of vanilla are evident in the enticing nose. The wine is rich, dark garnet in the glass. Tons of fruit hit your mouth on the entry followed by a mouthful of black cherry, cassis, cola, spice and just a hint of dark chocolate on the finish.

Name: Delys Morgon
Wine Description: Brilliant ruby-red. Fresh raspberry and violet scents are underscored by a zesty mineral quality and a hint of white pepper. On the palate, nervy red and dark berry flavours are given spine and definition by a vibrant mineral quality that builds in the glass. The mineral and floral notes repeat on a long, incisive finish that features smooth, building tannins.

Name: Barolo Bricco Gattera
Wine Description: Intense garnet red color. Warm and mature nose with notes of jam, raspberry, licorice, cherry and camphor. Soft mouth of remarkable structure with fine tannins and persistence.

Name: Cuvée Natalie Silver Belt Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The Pinot Noir Silver Belt Cuvée Natalie is the most powerful and broad shouldered of the Kistler/Occidental Pinots, partly because of the greater presence of Swan clone Pinot in this parcel. Dark red cherry, plum, game, savory herbs and wild flowers inform the deep, layered finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Ruby red with garnet tints.Delicate with touches of woodland fruit and berries, tobacco and sandalwood. The right balance between the fragrances of the sangiovese and the tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Inviting red fruit aromas of pomegranate, Rainier cherry and cranberry combine with rose, lavender, sandalwood and Indian spice to create a penetrating, complex, perfumed quality. Reflecting the aromas, the broad red fruit flavors along with blood orange and tobacco are carried by fine tannins, which provide great depth and length.

Name: Reserve Ode To Brothers
Wine Description: A beautiful balance of three classic Rhone varietals: Syrah, Grenache and Mourvedre. Our goal was to allow each to retain specific qualities to the wine. The Grenache brings flavors of ripe raspberries and red currants and keeps the mouthfeel light and bright. The Syrah brings complexity and a fuller mouthfeel with flavors of smoke and cured meats. Mourvedre brings notes of white pepper and an edge of minerality.

Name: La Florens
Wine Description: Black cherry, wild berries and mineral bouquet. Greatly evolved. A wine full of sensations and seductive yet elegantly subtle and aristocratic. Balsamic aromas are complemented by spiced Mediterranean herbs. Mouth filling, elegant and profound, both fresh and complex

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright ruby-red. Spicy cherry and black raspberry scents show very good clarity and suave floral and mineral highlights. Silky, sweet and precise on the palate, offering intense red and dark berry flavors that provide excellent palate.

Name: En La Place Bourgogne Pinot Noir
Jessie Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It contains savory aroma that often calls to mind rare-beef. It also tends to have a very fresh and appealing scent of minerality, along with some higher tone lavender. On the palate, Jessie tends towards a full mouth-feel and a deeper, darker, and rounder impression.

Name: Nuits-Saint-Georges
Wine Description: Vibrant fresh blueberry and black cherry fruit on the nose vivacious and nicely defined. The palate is smooth on the entry with tart red cherries and cranberries, a touch of black tea in the background. Good acidity and respectable weight.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Subtle notes of cocoa, graphite and a touch of forest floor complement the wine’s core flavors of blue fruit, plum and berry.

Name: Garys’ Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Pinot Noir Garys’ Vineyard displays sexy floral notes intermixed with blueberry, black raspberry and cherry notes, some forest floor, and again, that floral component that seems to come from some of these vineyards in the windswept Santa Lucia Highlands.

Name: Toasted Rope Syrah
Wine Description: Balanced and well-focused, with raspberry and smoky beef aromas and lively, complex flavors of black cherry, grilled herb and pepper.

Name: Feudo Pignatone Davanti Casa Etna Rosso
Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: Deep cherry red color with slightly tiled reflections. Very aromatic nose of ripe red berries. Aromas of licorice, underwood, as well as a sensation of minerality. Wood is present but well integrated. The palate is warm and gourmand, the mellow is balanced, the acidity fresh, and the tannins slightly bodied.

Name: Clos de la Feguine Beaune 1er Cru
Wine Description: Aromas of blackberry, blueberry developing into floral violet and spicy ones.

Name: Haiku
Wine Description: Deep ruby red in colour. A rich, emphatic nose, redolent of wild red berry fruit and spice. The palate shows crisp-edged and stylish, displaying wel-integrated fruit and aromatic spice. Overall, the wine is multi-layered, harmonious, and long-lingering.

Name: Barolo Brunate
Wine Description: Ruby, tending towards garnet, with intense notes of roses and violets, accompanied by a touch of damp earth and ripe red fruit. Tannins which are very persistent, though soft, speak to an evolution which will take a long time to complete.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Distinctive floral notes that are typical of the site. The pallet has a powerful blend of savory notes and ripe red and black fruits.

Name: Chante Perdrix Cornas
Wine Description: To the eye, the color is a deep garnet red. On the nose, the wine in his youth was marked by aromas of cassis. Over time, the fruity flavors fade gradually giving way to peppery and liquorice notes. The palate reveals a beautiful frame and full-bodied aroma characteristics of its terroir.

Name: Nebbiolo
Wine Description: Silky slippery dip towards a looming, alluring tannic finish.cherry, blackcurrant and some earthy, leathery tones.

Name: Nerosanlorè
Wine Description: It has ruby red, with intense, deep violet reflections. characteristic of red fruit, flowery. Fruity, harmonious, lingering finish.

Name: Vallocchio Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Deep ruby red with garnet nuances Colour. The nose boasts fruit aromas of cherry and plum blueberry jam accompanied by fresh spices, tobacco and licorice.

Name: Colonia Chianti Classico Gran Selezione
Wine Description: Intense ruby red color. Spicy aromas with earthy, mineral, tobacco and pleasant wild berry notes. On the palate, it has intense tannins needed for ageing the high concentration of the regional components typical to Fèlsina and Poggio a Rancia.

Name: Moth Love
Wine Description: Aromas of underbrush, smoked meat, lavender, blueberry, and plum inform the nose of a savory, sweetly-fruited, concentrated wine already revealing some complexity.
